title: The City of Dreams
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey hey, Miachi, what’s NYC like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s a unique city where cultures all over the world come together. I think it’s perfect for you, Ai.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>The people of NYC love fun and can get along with basically anyone, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm~, Ai sees. Ai wants to try going there. Would you take me to some fun places there, Miachi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh? No, I’m not really an outgoing person....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Is that so~. Where would you go then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Probably baseball matches and....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oooh, Ai would love to watch that! Take me there, take me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Haaah!? Geez, come on, let go of me.... I’ll do it, okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
